resources.string:
Explore a variety of rental options at Harbor View Residences, offering Bachelor, Junior 1, 1, and 2-bedroom apartments in the dynamic West end of Harbor City. Conveniently located just steps away from Harbor University, Bayview College, the Harbor General (HG) Hospital, shopping centers, gourmet restaurants, and the central business district, our address provides an ideal backdrop for a comfortable lifestyle.
Residents at Harbor View Residences can take advantage of the community room, featuring a restroom and kitchenette, perfect for hosting gatherings, or engage in a fitness routine at the buildingâ€™s exercise facility.
These tranquil Harbor City apartments provide tenants with the luxury of on-site amenities, including access to pizza, salon services, and a delightful cup of coffee at Harbor Brews, all within the property. With these offerings and our close proximity to educational institutions, shopping destinations, and downtown Harbor City, Harbor View Residences is your premier choice for the next chapter in apartment living. Discover the possibilities today.
